title: shiva ninhEgAdyO
sahitya:
shiva ninhEgAdyO tAyi gaNDa hara nI hEgAdyO


anupallavi

  shiva nInAdare shivanardhAngige davanAga bEkallO avivEki mUDha


caraNam 1    gangeya shiradalli dharisida namma shiva kumbhava horade badakombe khODi
    caraNam 2    maNDeyali mana mADida namma shiva uNDAda makkaLigavallO khODi
    caraNam 3    kAlakUTa viSa dharisida namma shiva cELu kaDidare hoDakombe khODi
    caraNam 4    keNDa gaNNa nosanosagiTTa namma shiva keNDava sOkalu aLUvyallO khODi
    caraNam 5    karuNA sAgara shrI purandara viTTalanna caravaNa smarisuta nI bALO khODi
